To be honest, Half-Life 2's weapons really aren't balanced for a particularly good deathmatch, and yet I've sunk hours into this game (Ignore the low hourcount, I played mostly before steam started tracking) becasue of the sheer variety of mods you find on servers. It's almost a sort of GMOD lite in that you never quite know what the map or gametype is going to be when you connect and it becomes sort of a cool hangout zone. Sometimes you get a co-op map or a werid obstacle course, or a wacky variety of characters and it's just fun to see what comes up.,
